statements: DELETE FROM crime_statistics WHERE neighborhood_name = 'Downtown' AND crime_type = 'Robbery';
DELETE FROM crime_statistics WHERE crime_date < '2022-01-01' AND crime_type = 'Assault';
DELETE FROM crime_data WHERE crime_id = 1001 AND neighborhood = 'Downtown';
DELETE FROM Suspects WHERE neighborhood_id = 3 AND age < 25;
DELETE FROM Suspects WHERE age > 30 AND neighborhood_id = 1;
DELETE FROM Crimes WHERE crime_type = 'Robbery' AND date_reported < '2022-01-15';
